sentences.sContent: The steel pillars began to buckle.

trans.tranCn: 〔因高温或压力〕（使）弯曲；扭曲；（使）变形
trans.tranOther: to become bent or curved because of heat or pressure, or to make something bend or curve in this way

trans.tranCn: 〔皮带等的〕金属扣环，扣子；带扣
trans.tranOther: a piece of metal used for fastening the two ends of a belt, for fastening a shoe, bag etc, or for decoration
